app_routes module¶

app_routes.images(email)¶

Function is a GET request that allows user to access all image file names that have been uploaded :param email: user email to query data from

app_routes.images_time(email)¶

Function is a GET request that allows user to access all upload times of photos of given user :param email: user email to query data from

app_routes.latency(email)¶

Function is a GET request that allows user to access the latency data

app_routes.post_image()¶

Function is a POST request. Takes in parameters of a base 64 image. Loads the original image from path, performs a function, then saves the altered image. Takes in base64 image and a number corresponding with the function to be performed

app_routes.user_stats(email)¶

Function is a GET request that allows user to access the statistics of filter functions queried based on the email address input
